alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 2:03AM MDT until October 06 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. * WHERE...Harding County, Northern Perkins County, Butte County and Southern Perkins County. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 8 AM MDT this morning. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MDT early this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locations that do not see temperatures below freezing this morning will likely fall below freezing for several hours on Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins
